selected_skills.name: extract_numerical_values_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: To extract the quantities of shiny buses and matte things from the image.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to extract numerical values from the image data provided.

selected_skills.name: compare_numerical_values
selected_skills.purpose: To compare the number of shiny buses to the number of matte things.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to determine if the number of shiny buses is less than the number of matte things.

selected_skills.name: map_comparison_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: To map the result of the comparison to the correct multiple-choice option.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to select the correct option based on the comparison result.
